name: Broccoli Strawberry Salad
author: mama426
summary: This is an interesting combination of ingredients, but it's delicious! I make it for every BBQ and at the end of the night I'm writing down the recipe for everyone! Try it, you'll definitely like it!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package Colby-Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 1/2-cubes
directions: Combine broccoli, strawberries, and Colby-Monterey Jack cheese in a large bowl
Whisk mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar together in another bowl until blended; pour over broccoli mixture
Sprinkle almonds over broccoli salad and gently toss to coat
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, 1 to 2 hours
